title: Why make this?
content: Portfolio and because I got to sharpen my skills hehe~

title: Tech stack?
content: Using [React](https://react.dev/) via [Vite](https://vite.dev/) on [Typescript](https://www.typescriptlang.org/), big help from [shadcn/ui](https://ui.shadcn.com/)!

title: Found an issue? Or suggestions?
content:
For issues, try clearing cache & cookies first.
If it persists, report via [Github Issues](https://github.com/jeffoxd/hsr-stellar-jades-calculator/issues) or contact me via [email](mailto:jeffoxd50@gmail.com)~

title: Credits
content: Inspired by this [HSR Free Stellar Jade Calculator](https://hsr-gem-calculator.netlify.app/), but unlike them who lists every event and updates whenever a new event is up, I would like to protect my sanity, respect though.

title: Recommendations
content: This [Gacha rate calculator](https://hutaobot.moe/tools/gachacalc) is pretty good for knowing how much probability of getting a character or weapon. And this [Warp tracker](https://starrailstation.com/en/warp#char_event) is useful for tracking your pulls.

title: Fun facts
content:
- The March Hunt theme background is the combination of Yanqing's and Yunli's color, there's also Immortal Delight's (boba tea she drinks) color!
 - I love March 7th~

title: NOTICE
content: *This calculator is only an estimation tool (towards lower bound) and may not be 100% accurate (though I'm open to any suggestions of making it more accurate). I am not liable for any miscalculations, poor decisions, nor mishaps you make on this gacha game. Gamble responsibly. ~~ALL OR NOTHING!!!~~*
